aircraft.value: Pegasus Swift - AC-5582-463 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Communication radio frequency drift. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 04/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 06/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 09/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 13/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
